title: 请问nick1.47科技整合架的server，为啥怪物越刷越少？
author: DPhil
txt_content:
nick1.47架的server，一张生存、困难模式地图玩了有3个月了，怪物越来越少，就是黑天也几乎啥怪物都没，尤其雪地气候

是有bug还是？

server.properties设置如下

#Minecraft server properties
#Tue May 21 17:26:42 CST 2013
generator-settings=
allow-nether=true
level-name=world
enable-query=false
allow-flight=false
server-port=25565
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-rcon=false
level-seed=
server-ip=
max-build-height=256
spawn-npcs=true
white-list=false
spawn-animals=true
snooper-enabled=true
hardcore=false
texture-pack=
online-mode=false
pvp=false
difficulty=3
server-name=Unknown Server
gamemode=0
max-players=10
spawn-monsters=true
generate-structures=true
view-distance=5
spawn-protection=16
motd=Elder's Vanilla Server复制代码
